subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: One of the U.S. Open’s most diabolical weapons is green speed. Nowhere will that be more evident than on the sloping No. 15 green at Bethpage.
snippet: One of the U.S. Open’s most diabolical weapons is green speed. Nowhere will that be more evident than on the sloping No. 15 green at Bethpage.
